node.statement: Choice of Test Vectors: Set W = W^circ (the essential Whittaker function / new vector of Pi, the unique-up-to-scalar nonzero vector fixed by K_1(p^{c(Pi)})). This depends only on Pi. For each pi, set V = V^circ (the essential Whittaker function of pi, fixed by K_1(q)). The key property W^circ(I_{n+1}) != 0 is guaranteed by the Matringe-Miyauchi characterization. The choice W = W^circ is made once and for all; only V^circ varies with pi.
